Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.api

Interface IMessageable

All Known Subinterfaces:
ICommandSender, IPPlayer, IPServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
IMessageable.BlackHoleMessageable, OfflinePPlayerSpigot, PPlayerSpigot, PServer
public interface IMessageable
Represents objects that can receive messages.
Author:
Pim

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    IMessageable.BlackHoleMessageable
    Implementation of IMessageable that does not send messages anywhere.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final IMessageable
    NULL
    Instance of IMessageable.BlackHoleMessageable that can be used in case messages should not be sent anywhere.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    sendMessage(String message)
    Sends a message to this object.

    sendMessage(Level level, String message)
    Sends a message to this object.

  • Field Details

    • NULL

      static final IMessageable NULL
      Instance of IMessageable.BlackHoleMessageable that can be used in case messages should not be sent anywhere.

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(Level level, String message)
      Sends a message to this object.
      Parameters:
      level - The level of the message, if applicable. Regular users, for example, should never see this.
      message - The message to send. This may or may not contain color codes.

    • sendMessage

      default void sendMessage(String message)
      Sends a message to this object. If this target supports levels, Level.INFO will be used.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send. This may or may not contain color codes.
